You are welcome on Voive. Voive is an Indian and indigenous app. The purpose of this app is to Collect The Normal and Daily Conversation Done By Indian People On A Daily Basis.So You Can Easily Relate To It . and take part in any conversations.So what\'s the delay start using voive Search For Conversation Looks like nobody in touch with you talks on Voive. Click on the share button above and invite the people of your life You\'re Offline Some Comment (OPTIONAL) Conversations In %1$s Initially we are doing only 50 registrations per day. because we are in beta version now Voice Map See which people you know well. who talks on Voive See Conversation On Map Set Playback speed We Start Your Global Chat With Latest 20 Messages.
